backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing attendance management system with access control, user profiles, attendance records, holiday/permission requests, invite codes, and RSVP functionality with role-based authorization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two implemented features: displaying employee full names instead of codes in HolidayApprovals and PermissionApprovals components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing JSON summaries of all frontend source files describing their functionality, Italian localization, and key features.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React application with root div and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing authentication flow, invite code detection, profile setup, onboarding, and dashboard routing with theme provider and loading states.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Application header component with theme toggle, user menu, logout functionality, and optional admin mode indicator with badge and accent styling.
frontend/src/components/HolidayApprovals: Admin interface for approving/rejecting holiday requests with filtering (pending/processed/all), statistics cards, and employee name display via useGetMultipleUserProfiles hook.
frontend/src/components/InviteManagement: Admin interface for generating role-specific invite codes (user/admin), viewing available/used codes with timestamps, copying invite links, and managing team member onboarding.
frontend/src/components/MyAttendance.tsx: Component for users to record, view, edit, and delete their own attendance records with day/week/month views, time tracking, activity types (project, service, generic, weekend, workshops), and status management.
frontend/src/components/MyHolidays.tsx: Component for users to submit holiday/vacation requests, view their holiday balance, and track request status (pending/approved/rejected) with monthly calendar navigation.
frontend/src/components/MyPermissions.ts: Component for users to submit permission requests with date ranges, reasons, and types (generic, medical, family emergency), and view their request history with approval status.
frontend/src/components/OnboardingFlow.t: Multi-step onboarding wizard that accepts an invite code, collects user profile information (name, position, employee status), submits RSVP, and checks for admin role assignment.
frontend/src/components/PermissionApprov: Admin component to view all permission requests with filtering (all/pending/processed), display user names from profiles, and approve or reject requests.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog for initial user profile setup, allowing users to select their role (admin/employee), enter name and position, and save profile with a default holiday balance of 20 days.
frontend/src/components/TeamOverview.tsx: Dashboard component displaying team attendance data with day/week/month views, statistics (present/remote/absent counts, hours worked), user profile lookups, and CSV export functionality for attendance and holiday requests.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout flow, identity persistence, and authentication status with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for backend data operations including user profiles, attendance records, holiday requests, permission requests, invite codes, RSVPs, and CSV exports with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining light and dark theme color schemes using OKLCH color space for UI components including sidebar, charts, and semantic colors.
frontend/src/lib/attendanceLabels.ts: Backward-compatibility wrapper that delegates attendance status and activity type label/badge variant functions to the centralized domainLabels module.
frontend/src/lib/domainLabels.ts: Provides centralized functions to map backend domain enums (AttendanceStatus, ActivityType, UserRole, etc.) to Italian labels and badge variants for consistent UI display.
frontend/src/lib/i18n/index.ts: Simple i18n utility that provides a type-safe `t()` function for accessing Italian translations via dot-notation keys with optional parameter interpolation.
frontend/src/lib/i18n/it.ts: Italian localization dictionary containing all UI strings organized by domain (common, auth, nav, attendanceStatus, etc.) as the single source of truth for translations.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility functions including `cn()` for merging Tailwind classes and multiple date formatting helpers that convert nanosecond timestamps to Italian-localized date strings.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrapping the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard page with personal/admin view toggle, displaying tabs for attendance, holidays, permissions, team overview, and approvals based on user role and selected mode.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login page component that displays Internet Identity authentication button, optional invite code alert, hero image, and feature cards describing the attendance system.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color tokens using OKLCH color space, container settings, border radius variables, animations, and plugin integrations for typography and animations.
project_state.json: Project state tracking implementation of employee name display in holiday and permission approval views, replacing employee codes with full names. Contains two completed features (REQ-1, REQ-2) and two pending feature requests (AR-1, AR-4) for the HR/leave management system.
